QuestData.Title: Our Path Ahead
QuestData.Description:
I have a message for Chief Kranac Sagesnow. I believe that it is not too late to lead our people down a |L303(80)-better|l path.
However, if he chooses the wrong direction, I see only |L303(90)-darkness|l ahead for our people.
When you are ready, I will |L303(80)-impart|l this message.
QuestData.LogDescription: Listen to the ancestor's message and convey it accurately.

Objectives.Objective: Give the message to Kranac Sagesnow
